resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/51224</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>51224</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:mats_341</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>mats_341</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Porcentajes e índices</string>
            <string language="en">Percentages and indices</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Prozentsätze und Indexe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Pourcentages et incréments</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Porcentagens e deslocamentos predeterminados</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Percentuali ed indici</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ποσοστά και ευρετήρια</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones el concepto de tanto por ciento. Se utiliza el concepto para aplicarlo al cálculo del Impuesto del Valor Añadido (IVA), interés simple e Índice de Precios al Consumo (IPC).</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations to teach the concept of percentage. It uses this concept to calculate Value Added Tax (VAT), simple interest and Consumer Price Indices (CPI).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">interés simple</string>
            <string language="en">simple interest</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">porcentaje</string>
            <string language="en">percentage</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">IPC</string>
            <string language="en">CPI</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">índice</string>
            <string language="en">index</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">IVA</string>
            <string language="en">VAT</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit welcher Gebrauch 
Simulationen, das Konzept des Prozentsatzes zu unterrichten. Er 
verwendet dieses Konzept, um Mehrwertsteuer (VAT), einfaches Interesse
und Verbraucherpreisindices (CPI) zu errechnen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles utilisations 
simulations d'enseigner le concept du pourcentage. Il emploie ce
concept pour calculer la taxe à la valeur ajoutée (TVA), l'intérêt
et les incréments de prix à la consommation à la consommation 
simples (CPI).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que usos simulações ensinar o
conceito da porcentagem. Usa este conceito calcular o imposto 
adicionado valor (VAT), o interesse e os deslocamentos predeterminados
de preço simples do consumidor (CPI).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali usi simulazioni 
insegnare il concetto della percentuale. Usa questo concetto per
calcolare la tassa sul valore aggiunto (IVA), l'interesse e gli indici
dei prezzi al consumo semplici (caratteri per pollice).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις προσομοιώσεις 
για να διδάξει την έννοια του ποσοστού. Χρησιμοποιεί αυτήν 
την έννοια για να υπολογίσει το φόρο προστιθέμενης αξίας (Φ.Π.Α),
το απλό ενδιαφέρον και τα ευρετήρια τιμών διάθεσης στην 
κατανάλωση (ΔΤΚ).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">einfaches Interesse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Prozentsatz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">CPI</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Index</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Vat</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">intérêt simple</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">pourcentage</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">CPI</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">incrément</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">TVA</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">interesse simples</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">porcentagem</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Cpi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">deslocamento predeterminado</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Vat</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">interesse semplice</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">percentuale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Caratteri per pollice</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">indice</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">IVA</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">απλό ενδιαφέρον</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ποσοστό</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ΔΤΚ</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ευρετήριο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φ.Π.Α</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
